Title: Master
Writer: Lokesh Kanagaraj (Dialogue), Lokesh Kanagaraj (Screenplay), Lokesh Kanagaraj (Story), Lokesh Kanagaraj (dialogue), Lokesh Kanagaraj (screenplay), Lokesh Kanagaraj (story), Rathna Kumar (dialogue), Pon Parthiban (dialogue)
Actors: Vijay Sethupathi, Joseph Vijay, Malavika Mohanan, Andrea Jeremiah
Plot: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.
